name: Nature Hunter
description:
This game is a 3D FPS game where you can wander freely in nature.
A mini-game in kind is available: You can collect mushrooms on a map in 5 minutes with a given score.
Powerful binoculars are at your disposal to view the field from afar and the little things.
A menu with modification of 12 languages.
An inventory with objects that can be sold and bought.
The StoneHenge site that can be visited.
